headline.main: OUR SOLOMONS COUP IS PRAISED IN CHINA; Paper Says It Proves Spirit and Ability of U.S. Forces

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Aug. 31 -- Characterizing the Solomons operations as a seesaw battle, Ta Kung Pao declared today that the action had affected Japan's strategy and at least had compelled her "to hesitate in her studied process of encroachment."
abstract: Chungking Ta Kung Pao comment on battle
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Aug. 31 -- Characterizing the Solomons operations as a seesaw battle, Ta Kung Pao declared today that the action had affected Japan's strategy and at least had compelled her "to hesitate in her studied process of encroachment."...

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
